name: BLOB of the deep
description:
A softbody physics based underwater adventure game.

Avoid dangers, sink ships by bashing them or with farts for food

and explore the secrets of the sea - a life of a runaway science project BLOB.

Story: Another scientific accident..

BLOB in search of his destiny and friends in the depths of the sea.

Controls: WASD/arrow keys and space bar.

Triple jump and double dash available.

Tip: Eat food to get less damage and be able to jump and fart.
